detail_desc: Ribbed jersey top with a round neckline decorated with plastic stones and long sleeves.
Ribbed jersey top with a round neckline decorated with plastic stones and long sleeves.
Triangle bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable straps. Gathered elastication with a small frill trim at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.

Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, frill trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a gold-coloured appliqué.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jumper in chunky, textured-knit cotton with a higher neckline, low dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Ribbed section at the top that accentuates the shoulders and creates a boxy fit. Decorative, contrasting colour stitching around the neckline, at the shoulders and around the sleeves, cuffs and hem. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Trousers in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly and button, patch front pockets, flap leg pockets and gently tapered legs.
Cardigan in soft cotton jersey with a collar, buttons down the front and side pockets.
Handkerchief in patterned mulberry silk. Size 33x33 cm.
Sleeveless top in a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back with a broderie anglaise flounce.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt that fastens at one side.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud.

Short dressing gown in satin with lace details. Dropped shoulders, wide, short sleeves, narrow ties inside and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, boxy jumper in loose-knit linen with contrasting colour cotton sections. Low dropped shoulders and a raw-knit hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with a racer back, lacing at the sides and raw edges. Gently rounded hem.

Short skirt in a checked weave with a wrapover front, fastener at the top, and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and ventilating mesh sections.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif, press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and elastication at the back. Side pockets and a sewn-in belt at the front with a covered metal buckle. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slim-fit, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.

Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Slim-fit, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
Set with a skirt in several layers of glittery tulle and an Alice band with a glittery crown on top. Skirt with elastication and a bow at the waist and a frilled hem.

Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric and a pair of trousers in cotton twill. Top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric and a pair of trousers in cotton twill. Top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Top and pair of trousers in organic cotton. Top in soft jersey with buttons at the top. Trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly, one side pocket with a decorative button and elasticated hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Calf-length culottes woven in a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, adjustable belt and pleats at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Calf-length culottes woven in a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, adjustable belt and pleats at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Ankle-length dress in an airy weave with an embroidered pattern. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared, tiered skirt with a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in liner dress with narrow shoulder straps.

Set with two pairs of shorts and two T-shirts in printed cotton jersey. T-shirts with a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and pockets in the side seams.
Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in soft cotton piqué with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a decorative button. Side pockets, a fake flap pocket with a button front and back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cotton jersey vest tops in various designs with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Two with a chest pocket.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and decorative buttons down the front.
Fabric-covered Alice bands with cat ears on top.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is partly recycled.
